title: Mato Grosso
summary: Mato Grosso (Portuguese pronunciation: [ˈmatu ˈɡɾosu] (listen) – lit. "Thick Bush") is one of the states of Brazil, the third largest by area, located in the Central-West region.[3] The state has 1.66% of the Brazilian population and is responsible for 1.9% of the Brazilian GDP.
